EmailTemplate.name: LLC + TM
EmailTemplate.subject: Your LegalZoom Inquiry
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Thank you for contacting LegalZoom for your business needs. In regard to your inquiry, LegalZoom can assist you in forming your Limited Liability Company (LLC) and in registering a Trademark. We simplify the process for you by preparing and filing the Articles of Organization with your respective Secretary of State, and by drafting a customized, state-specific Operating Agreement for your business, as well as conducting a Trademark Search and submitting the Trademark application to the US Patent & Trademark Office (USPTO) for registration.
For your reference, general information regarding establishing an LLC and Trademark registration has been outlined below. If you would like to get specific, detailed information on your personal situation, please contact a Business Formation Specialist at the phone number listed below. By speaking with a Specialist will be able to assist with answering further questions, as well as building a customized package to best benefit your needs.
An LLC is a state-specific business entity that provides several advantages as a business structure. Since an LLC is a separate and distinct legal entity, the people involved in the business are provided with personal liability protection, and their assets are shielded from any debts or liabilities that are incurred by the business. An LLC also provides name exclusivity in the state where it is registered, ensuring that other LLCs cannot use the same business name in the state. Once an LLC is established, it is able to conduct business, open a bank account, hire employees, and own property.
Trademark registrations typically protect identifying marks used in commerce such as business or product names, slogans, short phrases, logos, and/or acronyms used to represent specific products and/or services. The federal Trademark registration protects you against an inferior product or service diminishing your reputation or profitability, and allows you to enforce against any infringement upon these rights.
For your convenience, we have listed below all relevant pricing, as well as some additional services that may be beneficial to your business.
LIMITED LIABILITY COMPANY Express Gold - $359.00 + state fee - (7-10 business days)* Standard - $289.00 + state fee + shipping - (20-35 business days) Economy - $149.00 + state fee + shipping - (20-35 business days)
To view the state fee for your state, please follow the "PACKAGE DETAILS" link below and select your state from the drop-down list.
ADDITIONAL SERVICES EIN Obtainment - $79.00 ($49.00 with Express Gold package) Registered Agent - $159.00/year Business License Compliance Package - $74.99
GET STARTED http://www.legalzoom.com/limited-liability-company/limited-liability-company-overview.html PACKAGE DETAILS http://www.legalzoom.com/limited-liability-company/limited-liability-company-packages.html
TRADEMARK Complete Coverage - $189.00 + $325.00 USPTO filing fee Basic - $169.00 + $325.00 USPTO filing fee
TRADEMARK SEARCH OPTIONS Basic - Included w/package Comprehensive Federal & State - $149.00 (w/package) Comprehensive Federal, State, and Common Law - $249.00 (w/package) WorldScan Comprehensive International Search - $449.00 (w/package)
GET STARTED http://www.legalzoom.com/trademarks/trademarks-overview.html PACKAGE DETAILS http://www.legalzoom.com/trademarks/trademarks-pricing.html
* Some states may have delays which affect the listed turnaround time. To determine if your state is affected, please contact a Specialist at the phone number listed below.
Thank you for contacting LegalZoom with your business inquiries, and we look forward to assisting you. If you have any additional questions, please feel free to contact us by phone at the phone number listed below.
Best regards,
{!User.FirstName} (800) 773-0888 x{!User.Extension} www.legalzoom.com
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy: http://www.legalzoom.com/privacy-policy-popup.html
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
